list.title: AccountService#registerAdmin
list.description: Register an admin

list.title: CompanyService#_sendCompanyNotification
list.description: E-mails the given company using the provided notification template.

list.title: CompanyService#changeAttributes
list.description: Changes the attributes of a company

list.title: CompanyService#findAndDeleteById
list.description: Deletes a company by its ID and returns it

list.title: OfferSchema.query.withoutArchived
list.description: Currently active and non-archived Offers

list.title: OfferSchema.statics.filterCurrent
list.description: Currently active Offers (publish date was before Date.now and end date is after Date.now)

list.title: OfferSchema.statics.filterNonHidden
list.description: Currently active and non-hidden Offers

list.title: OfferService#_buildInitialSearchQuery
list.description: Builds an initial search query. Cannot be used when loading more offers. Otherwise, use _buildSearchContinuationQuery().

list.title: OfferService#_buildSearchContinuationQuery
list.description: Builds a search continuation query. Only use this when loading more offers. Otherwise, use _buildInitialSearchQuery().

list.title: OfferService#decodeQueryToken
list.description: Decodes a query token, extracting the FTS score and remaining offer's information

list.title: OfferService#encodeQueryToken
list.description: Encodes a query token, by taking an id and FTS score if present, and encoding them in safe url base64

list.title: OfferService#get
list.description: Fetches offers according to specified options Learn more about keyset search here: https://github.com/NIAEFEUP/nijobs-be/issues/129

list.title: OfferService#getOffersByCompanyId
list.description: Gets all the offers from a specific company that are visible to a specific user Note: This function will show even unpublished/inactive offers

list.title: OfferService#isVisibleOffer
list.description: Checks whether a given offer is visible to a specific userCompanyId. Unpublished/inactive offers may still be visible

list.title: checkDuplicatedEmail
list.description: Throws an error if it already exists a account with the given email.

list.title: concurrentOffersNotExceeded
list.description: Checks if the concurrent offers of a given owner have not exceeded the defined limit. If the offers in the timed period exceed the limit, checks how many are concurrent.

list.title: ensureArray
list.description:
Sanitizes the input val to return an array. If val is an array, this is a no-op Otherwise wraps val in an array

This is especially helpful when you expect an array in a query param, but a one-element array is given, therefore it is parsed as a string instead

list.title: hideInsecureError
list.description: Converts error to UnknownAPIError if it's not an instance of APIError

list.title: or
list.description:
Combines array of middleware using OR logic. Only fails if ALL functions fail (either by throwing or calling next(error))

Each middleware will receive a different req object, no not rely on it to be shared among them

The failed middleware errors will be available in the or field of the response. However, only APIErrors will show the actual error message, in order to prevent unwanted errors (such as DB's) to leak here

list.title: startServer
list.description: ahgsdjagsdjg

list.title: valuesInSet
list.description: Returns a validator that checks whether all of the elements of an array belong to the provided set of values

list.title: when
list.description: Util to allow running conditionally a middleware
